div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 21:54 pm CDT

div.span: Isolated showers and thunderstorms before midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. East southeast wind 7 to 9 mph becoming west southwest after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Sunny, with a high near 71. North wind 7 to 10 mph.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 42. North wind around 6 mph becoming south southwest after midnight.
